Durham.Old North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance: The Old North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance Company Building, also known as the Mechanics and Farmers Bank, is an office building at 114-116 West Parrish Street in downtown Durham, North Carolina. It formerly served as the headquarters for the North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance Company, one of the nation's largest companies founded and owned by African-Americans. The building was declared a National Historic Landmark in 1975.
